text:
(Is Mano singing over there...?
──It reminds me of when we first met.)

It's sudden but...
Do you want to try becoming an idol?

Howa, Producer-san...!
Thanks for all your hard work.

Sorry, did I interrupt you?
I thought it was a nice voice after all.

T-Thank you.
Well, I don't really know myself...

Haha, I think you should be more confident,
You know what Hiori and Meguru told you.

Y-Yes...!
It was... a great pleasure...

But, compared to the two of them,
I'm not ready for this...

It's okay, you might inevitably compare yourself
to them, but Mano has Mano's charm.

I'll do my best to support Mano in
developing her charm.

...Producer-san, it's kind of a relief
hearing that from you.
